title: Bug 109718: Tips show the content in one line when large content is put in a text item
description: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips should show the content in the given format. However, currently it shows the content in one line.
OB: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips show the content in one line.
EB: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips should show the content in the given format.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the text item section.
3. Put a large content in the text item.
4. Observe the tips showing the content in one line.
